metadata.title: CVE-2018-13258 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1 misses .htaccess files in the provided tarballused to protect some directories that shouldn't be web accessible.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
